course.subject: ENGG
course.name: Robotics Special Project: The NXP Cup Intelligent Car Racing 2021
course.description: The NXP Cup National University Students Intelligent Car Racing is a national competition for young engineers. Student teams will design and manufacture the racing model car for tackling different missions and challenges which are provided by the organizer. Normally, a project report is required. Enrollment in the project course may require instructor's approval. May be graded PP.

reviews.author: Alvispenguin
reviews.title: Good course to take
reviews.comment_content: Build a car and run on the track.
reviews.comment_teaching:
TA has solid knowledge and willing to teach.
Mostly self-learning, better have basic knowledge of your area, such as designing board, soldering, coding.
reviews.comment_grading:
Good grade.
Attendance are not required but suggest showing up in the lab more, at least B+ if attending all demo session and the final competition.
Mostly A range after submitting the final report.
reviews.comment_workload:
Not too much workload.
Need to be active in lab (just be in lab and make yourself useful)
Just need to finish the car and run on the track with the best time, not much workload if you are with good teammates.
And the final report is just doing the reflection of the past few months.
